item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: I will try to keep this blog alive and put everything related to my studies, work and life.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! My name is Mekhti Musaev (pronounced as Mehti Musayev). I’m currently employed as a Machine Learning Engineer at CGI Suomi Oy in Finland. If you have interesting position in Deep Learning field, feel free to drop me a message. In my leisure time I enjoy travelling, playing table tennis (aka ping pong), tennis, badminton, cycling, swimming, surfing (Portugal, eu te amo) and snowboarding. If you want to meet/talk with me, feel free to reach me (preferably via telegram).

item.title: Curriculum vitae
item.description: The most recent version of my cv is on my LinkedIn profile. Also you can find pdf version of my CV here. I always interested in good companies. If I am already employed, I could pay attention to your open source projects or even contribute.

item.title: Projects
item.description: During my career I have been collaborating into limited number of open source projects. My volunteer work for open source community started in 2016 when I was using several projects at work. In the following list one can find all open source projects where I am currently represented as a collaborator: RedBaron baron yapf (owned by Google) ELFI (owned by Aalto University, Finland)
